img_above_text:
### Outside the Wheel Luojia Fragrant Vine
Outside the Wheel Luojia Fragrant Vine
img_below_text:
The Outside the Wheel Luojia Fragrant Vine is in the cave you will pass through after defeating Captain Wise-Voice. Follow the path until you reach a room with a large pool of water in the center. The vine will be draped across the branches of a tree on the left side of the room.
### North Shore of the Bitter Lake Luojia Fragrant Vine

img_summary: The image depicts a character standing before the "Outside the Wheel Luojia Fragrant Vine," a glowing, vine-covered tree located in a cave setting. This vine is a notable environmental feature found after defeating Captain Wise-Voice and reaching a room with a large water pool. It serves as a key visual marker for players navigating the area in the game.
